analysis.description:
EBETCrowdsale.BuyEBETtokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#179-206) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#200-201)

Reentrancy in EBETCrowdsale.BuyEBETtokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#179-206):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#200-201)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundValue (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#204-205)
Parameter '_fundingStartBlock' of EBETCrowdsale.SetupCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#118-119) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_fundingEndBlock' of EBETCrowdsale.SetupCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#119-120) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of EBETCrowdsale.beneficiaryMultiSigWithdraw (/unique_chucks/5/0x1e932ce1e5167c4747196517783c2bc8106656f4.sol#209) is not in mixedCase
